channel.title: lucas rim | donut savant
channel.description: Recent content on lucas rim | donut savant

item.title: About
item.description: hi, i’m lucas. Full-stack software engineer based in Chicago. I also do a lot of improv comedy around the city. If you’d like to contact me for your web needs, or are Lorne Michaels and SNL needs a new face, please contact me at me@lucasrim.cool. Oh what’s this, a resume?

item.title: on job hunting
item.description: I’ve started window shopping for a new job lately. Not too actively, just sent out my resume to a couple places I had always wanted to work at, some quick hello’s to a couple people I know. A friend told me about a start up that I was pretty excited about, so I sent them a quick email, and got sent back a code challenge. Fair enough, I don’t mind a good code challenge, and might as well exercise that muscle if I do get serious about chasing my next opportunity.
